message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $11,000. How about we meet at $9,500? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
